English: As an employer, when we assess recent graduates,
the first thing I'll do is look on LinkedIn.
Chinese: 作为雇主，在我们评估应届毕业生时，
我要做的第一件事就是查看领英。

English: As an employer, when we assess recent graduates,
the first thing I'll do is look on LinkedIn.
Chinese: 作为雇主，当我们评估应届毕业生时，

input: As an employer, when we assess recent graduates, the first thing I'll do is look on LinkedIn.
